entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmppt_d9_bh/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0071.7646] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of 520,619,000 using the ProductOrServiceAxis in the role 1002000 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME on the table us-gaap:StatementTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax was the member wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element TypeOfRevenueExtensibleList/TypeOfCostGoodOrServiceExtensibleList with a value of wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember and the member wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of 520,619,000 without the product of service axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax fact are: Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7646 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1309108/000130910819000020/wex-20181231.xml 7234

property.name: label
property.value: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0071.7646] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of 569,166,000 using the ProductOrServiceAxis in the role 1002000 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME on the table us-gaap:StatementTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax was the member wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element TypeOfRevenueExtensibleList/TypeOfCostGoodOrServiceExtensibleList with a value of wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember and the member wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of 569,166,000 without the product of service axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax fact are: Period :2017-01-01 to 2017-12-31 Dimensions : srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=wex:PaymentProcessingRevenueMember Unit : USD
